species.name: rattata
descriptions: A RATTATA is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.
Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
It searches for food all day. It gnaws on hard objects to wear down its fangs, which grow constantly during its lifetime.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
